sqlMap.select: /* CenterMgmt.retrieveRegionList */ SELECT code, region_code, name, chief, address FROM UIP_REGION WHERE code = #code# order by code, region_code
sqlMap.insert: /* CenterMgmt.insertCenter */ INSERT INTO UIP_CENTER ( code, name, chief, address, phone ) VALUES ( #code#, #name#, #chief#, #address#, #phone# )
sqlMap.update: /* CenterMgmt.updateCenter */ UPDATE UIP_CENTER set name = #name#, chief = #chief#, address = #address#, phone = #phone# WHERE code = #code#
sqlMap.insert: /* CenterMgmt.insertRegion */ INSERT INTO UIP_REGION ( code, region_code, name, chief, address ) VALUES ( #code#, #regionCode#, #name#, #chief#, #address# )
sqlMap.update: /* CenterMgmt.updateRegion */ UPDATE UIP_REGION set name = #name#, chief = #chief#, address = #address# WHERE code = #code# AND region_code = #regionCode#
sqlMap.delete: /* CenterMgmt.deleteRegion */ DELETE FROM UIP_REGION WHERE code = #code# AND region_code = #regionCode#
